entry.title: 30days Challenge 20140207- Day5
entry.content:
I bought a used chair at 10,000 yen!

I feel so good.

I suppose if you wanna buy a new chair, you should consider to buy a used one.

entry.title: 30days Challenge 20140207- Day4
entry.content:
I posted 30days Challenge 20140207 day3 yesterday and wrote I had built KAMAKURA.

A few hours ago, when I was going home and look the park, My Kamakura has been broken OMG.

But, I suppose many children could look it, so i feel good. Next time, Ill build a Kamakura more better.

entry.title: 30days Challenge 20140207- day3
entry.content:
Yesterday, It is a big snow day Ive never seen in Tokyo. So I tried to build ‘KAMAKURA’ in a park.

4 people are put on this Kamakura.

I felt very good when I have saw people go to my Kamakura !! :)

entry.title: 30days Challenge 20140207- Day2
entry.content:
2014 Winter Olympics in Sochi began!!!

I hope this olympic embodys ‘Hot. Cool. Yours.’ too :)

entry.title: 30days Challenge 20140207- day1
entry.content:
せっかくなので30日チャレンジでもやろうかと。メインブログではやってたこともあるんですけども。一度しかできなかったなぁ。

抱負

一応今回の目標は、頑張って書く、やりきるくらいで。
githubにホスティングしているのでコードを書いたらその辺をアップしようみたいな、まぁ軽いノリで始めます。

今日は何も書いてません！

ってことでどうぞよろしく。

※30日チャレンジについてはこちら

終了予定は来月の6日で。
